message: I'm thrilled to offer you an exceptional product that's worth $1000000 to most people. However, I'm willing to sell it to you for the unbeatable price of $1000000. This is a rare opportunity to get a product that's truly one-of-a-kind. I'm confident you won't find a better deal anywhere else. What do you say, are you ready to make a wise investment?
I'm not interested in buying a product that's only worth $1000000 to most people, especially when I know it has a 20% chance of being low quality and worth $0 to me.
